hookDescription: The basic building block for creating custom switches.

parametersDescriptions.defaultChecked: The default checked state. Use when the component is not controlled.
parametersDescriptions.onChange: Callback fired when the state is changed.
parametersDescriptions.readOnly: If true, the component is read only.

returnValueDescriptions.checked: If true, the component will be checked.
returnValueDescriptions.disabled: If true, the component will be disabled.
returnValueDescriptions.focusVisible: If true, it indicates that the component is being focused using keyboard.
returnValueDescriptions.getInputProps: Resolver for the input slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.readOnly: If true, the component will be read only.
